name: Nasrin
description: We got so many products from their Bangladesh that we lost track of items which one is from them and which one is not. Here are few productsâ€™ snaps from our home. Definitely recommended.

name: Nehal
description: Purchased so many items from them but these frames are absolute favourites

name: Ziaul
description: Just went to the showroom (12 may 2021 at 3 pm) The people over there are 100% unprofessional. Does not know any product detail. If u ask: he he bhule gesi.They are not even ashamed. So disgusting.

name: Farzana
description: Delighted by  products and service delivery. Top notch workmanship in both cases. I received my arm chair today within a week of ordering and the salesman delivering it, Md Emdad, was very competent and mindful of following strict covid hygiene protocol. That was very impressive. Highly recommend them!

name: Nusrat
description: Love their products! Modern, simple and classy!

name: Khaled
description: I ordered a foldable laptop table. after confirming the order, they told it will take 10 working days to deliver. However, I was okay with that since I was really in need of it. after 10 days, they delivered it, but the product was faulty the keys for locking the table legs were loose I informed it to the delivery man right at that day.Too much unprofessional and reluctant!
